description: S.A. Waheed and Others Vs R.A.I. Chamara and Others before Hon. Damith Thotawatte, J.
parties: S.A. Waheed and Others Vs R.A.I. Chamara and Others
keywords: Sections 68(1) and (3) of the Primary Court’s Procedure Act No. 44 of 1979, Not the ownership or title but the factual state of possession, Forcible dispossession, PCPA jurisdiction: temporary and preventive in nature, Two-month statutory period, Necessity of a claim for restoration, Date of dispossession
legistation: The Constitution of the Socialist Democratic Republic of Sri Lanka The Primary Courts’ Procedure Act, No. 44 of 1979
